# sakura_workflows_revision_alias (Data Source)

Get information about an existing Workflows Revision Alias.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_workflows_revision_alias" "foobar" {
  workflow_id = "workflow-id"
  revision_id = "1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `revision_id` (String) The revision ID of the Workflows RevisionAlias.
- `workflow_id` (String) The workflow ID of the Workflows RevisionAlias.

### Read-Only

- `alias` (String) The alias name of the Workflows RevisionAlias.
